thread.section_title: MP3va Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MP3va | www.mp3va.com
thread.title: Clare Lobbezoo

author: Clare Lobbezoo
title: Clare Lobbezoo
text: I have literally spent over $1000.00 on this site.Problems are very rare.They have a wide variety of genres available.I listen to everything from death metal to jazz fusion and rarely do not find what i want on the site.I lean towards progressive rock and progressive metal and the selection available is mind boggling.Only notable exception I can think of is no King Crimson.
